revised_title: Experimental Researches on the Density and Expansion of Steam
tldr: This paper presents experimental research on the density and expansion of steam at various temperatures. The authors developed a new method to measure the density of steam and the rate of expansion of superheated steam. The results show that the density of saturated steam is always greater than that derived from gaseous laws, and the rate of expansion of superheated steam varies depending on the temperature.
